org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.svd

Interface BiasedMFKernel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DomainClampingKernel, DotProductKernel

    @DefaultImplementation(value=DotProductKernel.class)
public interface BiasedMFKernel
    A kernel for biased matrix factorization. This function combines a user-item bias (baseline score) and the user- and item-factor vectors to make a final score.

    Note that not all kernels are compatible with all model build strategies.

    Kernels should be serializable and shareable.

    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double apply(double bias, mikera.vectorz.AVector user, mikera.vectorz.AVector item)
      Apply the kernel function.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        double apply(double bias,
             @Nonnull
             mikera.vectorz.AVector user,
             @Nonnull
             mikera.vectorz.AVector item)
        Apply the kernel function.
        Parameters:
        bias - The combined user-item bias term (the baseline score, usually).
        user - The user-factor vector.
        item - The item-factor vector.
        Returns:
        The kernel function value (combined score).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the user and item vectors have different lengths.
